abstract: Miami Dolphins announce that defensive end Dion Jordan has been suspended for 2015 season after violating NFL's substance-abuse policy; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Miami Dolphins said defensive end Dion Jordan had been suspended for the 2015 season for violating the N.F.L.’s substance-abuse policy.

headline.main: Dolphins’ Jordan Is Barred for Season

snippet: The Miami Dolphins said defensive end Dion Jordan had been suspended for the 2015 season for violating the N.F.L.’s substance-abuse policy.
